issue.title: Can not import `bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller` when using PhoneInput component
issue.body:
## Current Behavior
I am using [vite@^2.0.5](https://vitejs.dev/) (which is using Rollup) and when I import `PhoneInput` component, it fail to build.

```
10:03:50 PM [vite] new dependencies found: baseui/phone-input, updating...
 > node_modules/baseui/node_modules/react-virtualized/dist/es/WindowScroller/utils/onScroll.js:74:9: error: No matching export in "node_modules/baseui/node_modules/react-virtualized/dist/es/WindowScroller/WindowScroller.js" for import "bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller"
    74 │ import { bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller } from "../WindowScroller.js";
       ╵          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

## Expected Behavior
The build stage should be done perfectly.

## Your Environment
| Tech    | Version |
| ------- | ------- |
| Base UI | v9.111.2 |
| React | v17.0.0 |
| Vite | v2.0.5 |

- [x] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/uber/baseweb/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

comment.body: We also have the same error as described above.

## Deploying with    Cloudflare Pages
Latest commit: 5ecb6e8
Status:🚫  Build failed.
[View logs](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/pages/view/baseweb/c6180685-1ee5-4e4c-92df-b13bcaf2c912)

issue.title: Can not import `bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller` when using PhoneInput component
issue.body:
## Current Behavior
I am using [vite@^2.0.5](https://vitejs.dev/) (which is using Rollup) and when I import `PhoneInput` component, it fail to build.

```
10:03:50 PM [vite] new dependencies found: baseui/phone-input, updating...
 > node_modules/baseui/node_modules/react-virtualized/dist/es/WindowScroller/utils/onScroll.js:74:9: error: No matching export in "node_modules/baseui/node_modules/react-virtualized/dist/es/WindowScroller/WindowScroller.js" for import "bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller"
    74 │ import { bpfrpt_proptype_WindowScroller } from "../WindowScroller.js";
       ╵          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

## Expected Behavior
The build stage should be done perfectly.

## Your Environment
| Tech    | Version |
| ------- | ------- |
| Base UI | v9.111.2 |
| React | v17.0.0 |
| Vite | v2.0.5 |

- [x] I have searched the [issues](https://github.com/uber/baseweb/issues) of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

comment.body:
